TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EncryptedType extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示類別 和 藉以衍生的抽象基底類別。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表抽象的基底類別的類別和衍生。The class represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive. 這兩個類別會包含實際加密的資料或 XML 加密中的重要資訊。These two classes contain the actual encrypted data or key information in XML encryption. 若要符合 XML 加密標準，您應該使用這兩個衍生的類別。To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use these two derived classes. 如需有關 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 加密語法和處理 1.1 版](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information on XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。This constructor creates a new instance of the class. 此類別代表抽象的基底類別的類別和衍生。This class represents the abstract base class from which the classes and derive. 若要符合 XML 加密標準，您應該使用兩個衍生的類別。To comply with XML encryption standards, you should use the two derived classes. 如需有關 XML 加密標準的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 加密語法和處理 1.1 版](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。For more information on XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing Version 1.1](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks ``項目是必要的項目，提供加密的資料的 XML 加密中。The `` element is a required element in XML encryption that provides the encrypted data. 它必須包含已加密的八位元序列，做為 base64 編碼的文字屬性，或提供包含加密的八位元順序使用的外部位置的參考屬性。It must either contain the encrypted octet sequence as the base64-encoded text of the property, or provide a reference to an external location containing the encrypted octet sequence using the property. 如需此元素的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about this element, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會描述加密資料的編碼方式。This property describes the encoding of the encrypted data. 例如，如果加密的資料是 base64 編碼的 PNG，無法指定編碼為http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'。For example, if the encrypted data is a base64-encoded PNG, the encoding could be specified as 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64'. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 此範例接著會顯示的各種屬性類別到主控台。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. remarks.format: ## Remarks ``是選擇性的項目描述套用至加密資料的加密演算法。The `` is an optional element that describes the encryption algorithm applied to the encrypted data. 如果項目不存在，必須已知收件者的加密演算法或解密會失敗。If the element is absent, the encryption algorithm must be known by the recipient or decryption will fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string MimeType { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property MimeType As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ MimeType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.MimeType : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 加密中 執行個體的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密資料之媒體類型的字串。

span.span: A string that describes the media type of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `MimeType`屬性是描述加密資料的媒體類型的選擇性屬性。The `MimeType` attribute is an optional attribute that describes the media type of the encrypted data. 此屬性的值是所定義的值的字串[RFC 2045： 多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準 (MIME) 第一段： 網際網路訊息本文格式](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt)。The value of this attribute is a string with values defined by [RFC 2045: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Part One: Format of Internet Message Bodies](https://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc2045.txt). 比方說，如果已加密的資料是 base64 編碼 PNG`Encoding`屬性會是 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64' 和`MimeType`會是 ' image/png '。For example, if the data that is encrypted is a base64-encoded PNG, the `Encoding` attribute would be 'http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#base64' and the `MimeType` would be 'image/png'. 這個屬性是選擇性的任何驗證和`MimeType`資訊是必要的。This attribute is optional and no validation of the `MimeType` information is required. 屬性不表示加密應用程式必須進行其他處理。The attribute does not indicate that the encryption application must do any additional processing. 請注意這項資訊可能不需要，如果它已繫結中的識別碼`Type`屬性。Note that this information may not be necessary if it is already bound to the identifier in the `Type` attribute. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. 此範例接著會顯示的各種屬性類別到主控台。This sample then displays various properties of the class to the console. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/vb/sample.vb#1)]

Public Overridable Property Type As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Type : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 加密中 執行個體的 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attribute of an instance in XML encryption.

value.span: 描述加密資料之文字形式的字串。

span.span: A string that describes the text form of the encrypted data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Type`屬性是選擇性的屬性，可識別之文字形式的加密內容的型別資訊。The `Type` attribute is an optional attribute that identifies type information about the text form of the encrypted content. 雖為選擇性的這是重要的屬性，並用於強制處理中所述[規則處理： 解密](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)（4.2 節） 的 XML 加密語法和處理規格 (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/)。While optional, this is an important attribute and is used in mandatory processing described in [Processing Rules: Decryption](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/) (section 4.2) of the XML Encryption Syntax and Processing specification (https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/). 如果``項目包含的資料型別的`'element'`或項目`'content'`，並取代，XML 文件中的資料，強烈建議`Type`提供屬性。If the `` element contains data of type `'element'` or element `'content'`, and replaces that data in an XML document, it is strongly recommended that the `Type` attribute be provided. 如果沒有此資訊，嘗試解密資訊的應用程式將無法自動還原成其原始的文字形式的 XML 文件。Without this information, the application attempting to decrypt the information will be unable to automatically restore the XML document to its original text form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密和解密 XML 項目使用類別衍生自類別。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element using the class that derives from the class. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML-EncryptedData - EncryptedType/vb/sample.vb#1)]
